item.description: Cost : Free Time : 2:00pm - 9:00pm Open Board Gaming Refrigerator and Microwave on site. Possible child care depending on interest.  (If your interested in coming but you need someone to watch your child/children contact me.  There's a great chidrens area/nursery and I may be able to provide child care for a small fee. (The teens in the church are trying to raise money for a trip.))

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: Southern New Hampshire Board Game Afternoon
